ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to CNPq and Capes, institutions for scientific support of the Brazilian Government, and to PROPESP/Universidade Federal do Par√°, Brazil. WNS and JKRS participated in this work as part of the activities of the Aromatic Plant Research Center (APRC, https://aromaticplant.org/) (accessed on 11 February 2021).
